_description: On the difficulties of logic — seven macaronic couplets

CamCCC329.Transcription:
Summa totalisNescio que qualisSed si sit tantamest que
                        qualis quantamAssencio Ihesu negatyveI cannat
                        contryveVtrum partycularNescio wel syngularvel
                        indiffinitaScio non Ita
CamCCC329.Editions:
James,  Montague Rhodes. 
             A Descriptive Catalogue of the Manuscripts in the Library of Corpus
                Christi College, Cambridge.
